name: A Visit to the Optometrist
description:
A Visit to the Optometrist by Caleb Noller

Night has descended upon Saputo Cheese Factory leaving just a single worker and whatever hungry mice lie waiting in the shadows.

Playing as that worker, you find yourself the next day at Neville, the optometrist, and casually recount the happenings of the night before.

Walk and discover the unfolding tale in this small Bitsy experience.

 

Inspired by an idea from my Dad, when a customer told him about a mouse plague around the nearby cheese factory. My dad is an optometrist.

 

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow keys: move

Music: 'Magical Forest' by Sir Cubesworth from YouTube Audio Library

See also:

  • Susurrus: A narrative adventure inspired by 90's multimedia games, walking simulators and film
